short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using this theme is like entering a fantasy realm where a mysterious worldly being may live at the end of the moon...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension showcases the iconic Eiffel Tower in Paris, illuminated by sparkling lights at night, celebrating the romantic and classic beauty of the Eiffel Tower, perfect for those who appreciate the elegance and cultural charm of Europe.
